channel.title: The Walking Dead
channel.description:
So does anyone know about the television series 'The Walking Dead'? It's about these zombies that take over the city and there's somewhat 10-15 survivors left and they managed to escape.
There's been 3 series released I think, and I havn't even watched a whole series. What got me into this television series was last weeks series (Sunday) which was really good. I was wondering, does anyone watch it, how long have you been watching it for, do you like it, and is it on today (Sunday)?

item.title: The Walking Dead

@X_Entinity_X wrote:

It’s on tonight guys, should be good!

item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

I watched the whole of Season 1. Was really good actually.

If you want to download it… You can get it here; http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6015401/The_Walking_Dead_-_The_Complete_Season_1

item.title: The Walking Dead

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You can look at this: http://www.amctv.com/shows/the-walking-dead

I’ve heard of the show but never watched it. Some of the zombies remind me of ‘Shaun of the dead’.
